description: Experiencing buffering issues with Perfect Player? This guide provides solutions to fix buffering issues in 2025.

content.intro: Buffering Issues in Perfect Player can be frustrating, but most issues are easy to fix. This guide covers the most common causes and solutions specific to Perfect Player.
solutions: Check your internet speed (minimum 25 Mbps for HD)
Use ethernet instead of Wi-Fi
Try a different server/stream
Use a VPN to bypass ISP throttling
Close other apps and devices using bandwidth
Clear app cache and restart
Adjust buffer size in player settings
Clear Perfect Player cache: Go to Settings > Apps > Perfect Player > Clear Cache
